title: A Great day to go
creator_credit: Hugh Macdonald, Ronald Bowie and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: A variety of people are shown enjoying water activities, e.g. surfing, boating, fishing. Through their thoughtlessness, tragedies occur in the water. Produced for the New Zealand National Water Safety Council.
